entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-24
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator does not add VersionInformation to generated XmlSerializers.dll file #36964
  • dotnet ef cannot find sdk on Ubuntu 23.04 #36380
  • [NET 8.0 - RC2] Warning: Failed to read or parse localization file "C:\Program Files\.....\microsoft.dotnet.web.projecttemplates.8.0.8.0.0-rc.2.23480.2.nupkg ......... #36000

Updated

  • PackageInstall.Tests timeout known build error #36192
  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • 7.O RTM Error #28373
  • dotnet watch on net6.0 project results in FileNotFoundException for SystemRuntime #28942
  • dotnet gloabl tool can not be start after uprade to dotnet sdk 8.0 on Ubuntu(WSL) #37017
  • dotnet pack fails when `GeneratePackageOnBuild` is `true` #10335
    Discussion
  • global.json is ignored if cwd is out of project or solution directory #28399
  • dotnet tool package cache bug #28695

PullRequests

Created

  • [HotReload] Skips Browser refresh middleware when running against an unsupported target framework version #37139

Updated

  • [Blazor] Replace `webapp,razor` with `blazor` on `dotnet new` #36657
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2322571 #36923
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
